curam.util.persistence

Interface EntityAdapter<ID,DTLS_STRUCT>

  • Type Parameters:
    ID - The object type used as the key to a row. Typically a primitive or boxed type, rather than the generated Key struct. Must be immutable and have a natural implementation of Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode().
    DTLS_STRUCT - The generated Curam "dtls" struct which holds a row of data from the physical database table.

    public interface EntityAdapter<ID,DTLS_STRUCT>
    Standardizes the names of basic database operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<DTLS_STRUCT> getDtlsClass()
      Gets the class of the generated dtls struct used to interact with this database table.
      ID getKey(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
      Identifies the key value of the row specified.
      int getVersionNo(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
      Gets the version number of the database row.
      void insert(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
      Creates a new row on a physical database table.
      void modifyNoLock(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
      Modifies an existing row on a physical database table.
      void modifyWithOptimisticLock(DTLS_STRUCT dtls, int versionNo)
      Modifies an existing row on a physical database table with the version number specified.
      DTLS_STRUCT newDetails()
      Creates a new "empty" row, with fields set to their default values (as specified by the Curam server code generator).
      DTLS_STRUCT read(ID key, boolean forUpdate)
      Reads a row of data from a physical database table.
      void remove(ID key)
      Removes an existing row from a physical database table.

    • Method Detail

      • getDtlsClass

        java.lang.Class<DTLS_STRUCT> getDtlsClass()
        Gets the class of the generated dtls struct used to interact with this database table.
        Returns:
        The class of the generated dtls struct used to interact with this database table.

      • getKey

        ID getKey(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
        Identifies the key value of the row specified.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The row being interrogated.
        Returns:
        The key value of the row.

      • getVersionNo

        int getVersionNo(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
          throws UnimplementedException
        Gets the version number of the database row.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The database row.
        Returns:
        The version number of the database row.
        Throws:
        UnimplementedException - if the database table does not support optimistic locking.

      • insert

        void insert(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
        Creates a new row on a physical database table.
        Parameters:
        dtls - the row to create. The key field on the row may be set by any automatic key generation implemented by the data access layer.

      • modifyNoLock

        void modifyNoLock(DTLS_STRUCT dtls)
        Modifies an existing row on a physical database table.
        Parameters:
        dtls - the row to modify. The key of the row to be modified will be taken from the key field in this parameter.

      • modifyWithOptimisticLock

        void modifyWithOptimisticLock(DTLS_STRUCT dtls,
                              int versionNo)
                       throws UnimplementedException
        Modifies an existing row on a physical database table with the version number specified.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The row to modify. The key of the row to be modified will be taken from the key field in this parameter.
        versionNo - The version number to use. The operation will fail if the version number on the database row does not match this version number.
        Throws:
        UnimplementedException - if the database table does not support optimistic locking, or if optimistic locking is not switched on for the modify operation.

      • newDetails

        DTLS_STRUCT newDetails()
        Creates a new "empty" row, with fields set to their default values (as specified by the Curam server code generator).
        Returns:
        A new "empty" row.

      • read

        DTLS_STRUCT read(ID key,
                 boolean forUpdate)
        Reads a row of data from a physical database table.
        Parameters:
        key - The primary key of the row to be read.
        forUpdate - Whether to lock the database row by performing a "read for update".
        Returns:
        A row of data retrieved from the physical database table.

      • remove

        void remove(ID key)
        Removes an existing row from a physical database table.
        Parameters:
        key - The primary key of the row to remove.
